title: Transfering Account from OCE TO NA
body: I had moved to OCE from NA a few weeks earlier because my friend had convinced me too, and now I want to move back, but in the account page, there's only the name change option. So is there any way I can accomplish the account transfer?

replies.body:
Looks like it's not up on the status page yet, but transfers are currently disabled because of a bug causing a level reset.

If you ticket support they might be able to give you a timeline or some more info on a fix but no guarantees: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

There is a vague chance that they'll be able to do the transfer manually, but I wouldn't count on it unfortunately.
